Pinyin1: wǒmen quánjiā dōu qùguò běijīng 。
Translate1: Our whole family has been to Beijing.

Pinyin1: quán gōngsī de rén dōu bù xǐhuan xīn lǎobǎn 。
Chinese1: 全公司的人都不喜欢新老板。
Translate1: Nobody in the company likes the new boss.

Pinyin1: yùndòng wán yǐhòu wǒ quánshēn dōu shì hàn 。
Chinese1: 运动完以后我全身都是汗。
Translate1: After exercising, I was sweating all over my body.

Pinyin1: quánxiào dōu fàngjià le 。
Translate1: The whole school is on holiday.

Pinyin1: zhège dìfāng quánnián dōu hěn rè 。
Translate1: This place is hot all year round.

Pinyin1: dàjiā quándōu dào le 。
Translate1: Everyone is here.

Pinyin1: wǒ māma zuò de cài quándōu hàochī 。
Chinese1: 我妈妈做的菜全都好吃。
Translate1: All the dishes my mother cooks are delicious.

Pinyin1: zuòyè quándōu zuò wán le ma ？
Translate1: Have you finished all your homework?

Pinyin1: nǐ quándōu názǒu bā 。
Translate1: You take it all.

Pinyin1: tāmen quándōu méi qù 。
Translate1: None of them went.

Pinyin1: zhège zhōumò wǒmen quándōu bù zàijiā 。
Chinese1: 这个周末我们全都不在家。
Translate1: We're not at home this weekend.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē cài quándōu méishú 。
Translate1: Dishes were undercooked.

Pinyin1: tā dehuà wǒ quándōu bù xiāngxìn 。
Translate1: I don't believe all of his words.

Pinyin1: càitàiduō le ， wǒmen méi quándōu chī wán 。
Chinese1: 菜太多了，我们没全都吃完。
Translate1: There were too many dishes and we didn't finish them all.

Pinyin1: zuótiān zuòyè tàiduō le ， wǒ méi quándōu zuò wán 。
Chinese1: 昨天作业太多了，我没全都做完。
Translate1: There was too much homework yesterday, and I didn't finish all of it.

Pinyin1: wǒ èsǐ le 。
Translate1: I am starving.

Pinyin1: jīntiān lèisǐ le 。
Translate1: I'm exhausted today.

Pinyin1: rèsǐ le ！
Translate1: it's too hot!

Pinyin1: zhè jǐtiān máng sǐ le 。
Translate1: Been so busy these days.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn yīfú chǒusǐ le 。
Translate1: This dress is ugly.

Pinyin1: nǐ de fángjiān zàngsǐ le 。
Translate1: Your room is dirty.

Pinyin1: chǎosǐ le ！
Translate1: It's so loud!

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de dōngxi guìsǐ le 。
Translate1: Things here are expensive.

Pinyin1: wǒmen dōu jísǐle 。
Translate1: We are all anxious.

Pinyin1: wā ， kěài sǐ le ！
Translate1: Wow, so cute!

Pinyin1: zhège dàngāo hàochī sǐ le 。
Translate1: this cake is so delicious

Pinyin1: zhè jǐge dìfāng dōu chàbuduō 。
Translate1: These places are pretty much the same.

Pinyin1: zhè liǎnggè cí de yìsi chàbuduō 。
Chinese1: 这两个词的意思差不多。
Translate1: The two words mean about the same.

Pinyin1: wǒmen de xiǎngfǎ chàbuduō 。
Translate1: We're pretty much on the same page.

Pinyin1: nà liǎngjiā cāntīng de cài chàbuduō 。
Chinese1: 那两家餐厅的菜差不多。
Translate1: The dishes in the two restaurants are similar.

Pinyin1: nǐmen de zhōngwén shuǐpíng chàbuduō 。
Chinese1: 你们的中文水平差不多。
Translate1: Your Chinese level is about the same.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ de tiānqì gēn táiwān de tiānqì chàbuduō 。
Chinese1: 这里的天气跟台湾的天气差不多。
Translate1: The weather here is similar to that in Taiwan.

Pinyin1: nǐ de gōngzuò gēn wǒ de gōngzuò chàbuduō 。
Chinese1: 你的工作跟我的工作差不多。
Translate1: Your job is similar to mine.

Pinyin1: nǐ de xīnshǒujī gēn wǒ de jiù shǒujī chàbuduō 。
Chinese1: 你的新手机跟我的旧手机差不多。
Translate1: Your new phone is pretty much the same as my old one.

Pinyin1: zhè liǎnggè háizi chàbuduō dà 。
Translate1: The two children are about the same age.

Pinyin1: wǒ gēn wǒ gēge chàbuduō gāo 。
Translate1: I am about the same height as my brother.

Pinyin1: wǒ chàbuduō dào gōngyuán ménkǒu le 。
Chinese1: 我差不多到公园门口了。
Translate1: I'm almost at the gate of the park.

Pinyin1: diànyǐng chàbuduō yào kāishǐ le 。
Translate1: The movie is about to start.

Pinyin1: jīntiān de gōngzuò chàbuduō zuò wán le 。
Chinese1: 今天的工作差不多做完了。
Translate1: Today's work is almost done.

Pinyin1: nǐ érzi chàbuduō wǔsuì le bā ？
Chinese1: 你儿子差不多五岁了吧？
Translate1: Is your son almost five years old?

Pinyin1: tā zhù zài shànghǎi chàbuduō sānge yuè le 。
Chinese1: 他住在上海差不多三个月了。
Translate1: He has lived in Shanghai for almost three months.

Pinyin1: wǒ zài zhèjiā gōngsī gōngzuò le chàbuduō shínián le 。
Chinese1: 我在这家公司工作了差不多十年了。
Translate1: I have been with this company for almost ten years.

Pinyin1: chàbuduō liǎnggè xīngqī yǐqián ， wǒ zài běijīng jiàn guò tā 。
Chinese1: 差不多两个星期以前，我在北京见过他。
Translate1: I met him in Beijing almost two weeks ago.

Pinyin1: kànlai tā bùlái le ， dōu zhèmewǎn le 。
Chinese1: 看来他不来了，都这么晚了。
Translate1: It seems that he is not coming, it is so late.

Pinyin1: kànlai nǐ wán dé bù gāoxìng ， zěnme zhème zǎojiù huílai le ？
Chinese1: 看来你玩得不高兴，怎么这么早就回来了？
Translate1: It seems that you are not having a good time, why did you come back so early?

Pinyin1: xiànzài kànlai ， shìqing méi nàme zāo 。
Chinese1: 现在看来，事情没那么糟。
Translate1: Now it seems that things are not so bad.

Pinyin1: zàiwǒkànlái ， bùhuì huāqián de rén jiù bùhuì xiǎngshòu shēnghuó 。
Chinese1: 在我看来，不会花钱的人就不会享受生活。
Translate1: In my opinion, people who can't spend money can't enjoy life.

Pinyin1: wǒ zhènghǎo yào chūqù ， lājī wǒlái rēng bā 。
Chinese1: 我正好要出去，垃圾我来扔吧。
Translate1: I'm just about to go out, let me throw out the garbage.

Pinyin1: nǐ lái le ！ wǒ zhènghǎo yào zhǎo nǐ 。
Translate1: You came! I was just looking for you.

Pinyin1: tā zhènghǎo wèn le wǒ xiǎng wèn de wèntí 。
Chinese1: 他正好问了我想问的问题。
Translate1: He asked exactly the question I wanted to ask.

Pinyin1: wǒ zhènghǎo yě zài zhèlǐ shíxí 。
Translate1: I happen to be doing an internship here as well.

Pinyin1: zhènghǎo nǐmen dōu shì dānshēn 。
Translate1: It just so happens that you are both single.

Pinyin1: wǒ míngtiān jiàn tā ， zhènghǎo kěyǐ wènwèn tā zhèjiàn shì 。
Chinese1: 我明天见他，正好可以问问他这件事。
Translate1: I'll see him tomorrow, just in time to ask him about it.

Pinyin1: wǒmen zhènghǎo yě yào qù nàr ， yīqǐ zǒu bā 。
Chinese1: 我们正好也要去那儿，一起走吧。
Translate1: We happen to be going there too, let's go together.

Pinyin1: wǒ qiāomén de shíhou ， tā zhènghǎo chūmén 。
Chinese1: 我敲门的时候，他正好出门。
Translate1: He happened to be out when I knocked on the door.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn yīfú de dàxiǎo zhènghǎo 。
Translate1: The size of the dress is just right.

Pinyin1: shuǐwēn zhènghǎo ， bùlěng yě bù rè 。
Translate1: The water temperature was just right, neither hot nor cold.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē cài yòu méihuài ， wèishénme yào rēng ？
Chinese1: 这些菜又没坏，为什么要扔？
Translate1: These dishes are not bad, why throw them away?

Pinyin1: bùyào shēngqì ， wǒ yòu bùshìgùyì de 。
Chinese1: 不要生气，我又不是故意的。
Translate1: Don't be angry, I didn't mean to.

Pinyin1: jīntiān yòu bù rè ， kāi kōngtiáo gànmá ？
Chinese1: 今天又不热，开空调干吗？
Translate1: It's not hot today, why turn on the air conditioner?

Pinyin1: míngtiān yòu bù shàngbān ， nàme zǎo qǐchuáng gànmá ？
Chinese1: 明天又不上班，那么早起床干吗？
Translate1: You don't go to work tomorrow, so why get up so early?

Pinyin1: nǐ xiànzài yòu bùmáng ， lái bāng wǒ yīxià 。
Chinese1: 你现在又不忙，来帮我一下。
Translate1: You are not busy now, come and help me.

Pinyin1: wǒ yòu méichīguò ， zěnme zhīdào hǎobuhǎo chī ？
Chinese1: 我又没吃过，怎么知道好不好吃？
Translate1: I haven't eaten it yet, how do I know if it's good or not?

Pinyin1: háizi yòu méi zuò cuò ， dǎ tā gànmá ？
Chinese1: 孩子又没做错，打他干吗？
Translate1: The child did nothing wrong, why beat him?

Pinyin1: yòu méi xiàyǔ ， dàisǎn gànmá ？
Translate1: It's not raining, why bring an umbrella?

Pinyin1: yòu bùguān nǐ de shì ， wèn nàme duō gànmá ？
Chinese1: 又不关你的事，问那么多干吗？
Translate1: It's none of your business, why ask so many questions?

Pinyin1: zhè zhǐ xiǎogǒu kě táoqì le ！
Translate1: This puppy is naughty!

Pinyin1: nǐ kěbié hē tàiduōjiǔ 。
Translate1: Don't drink too much alcohol.

Pinyin1: nǐ kěbié zǒu ！
Translate1: don't go!

Pinyin1: huà kě bùnéng zhèyàng shuō 。
Translate1: You can't say that.

Pinyin1: nǐ yuánlái de fàxíng yě hěn kěài 。
Chinese1: 你原来的发型也很可爱。
Translate1: Your original hairstyle is also lovely.

Pinyin1: tāmen yuánlái zhǐshì línjū ， xiànzài shì hěn hǎo de péngyou 。
Chinese1: 她们原来只是邻居，现在是很好的朋友。
Translate1: They used to be just neighbors, but now they are good friends.

Pinyin1: yuánlái tā shì tā de zhōngwén lǎoshī ， xiànzài shì tā lǎopó 。
Chinese1: 原来她是他的中文老师，现在是他老婆。
Translate1: It turned out that she was his Chinese teacher, and now she is his wife.

Pinyin1: yuánlái shì nǐ ！
Translate1: Oh it's you!

Pinyin1: yuánlái nǐmen rènshi ！
Translate1: So you guys know each other!

Pinyin1: yuánlái shì zhèyàng ！
Translate1: So it is!

Pinyin1: yuánlái nǐ zhème yǒuqián ！
Translate1: So you are so rich!

Pinyin1: yuánlái nǐ zài piàn wǒ ！ wǒ zěnme nàme shǎ ？
Chinese1: 原来你在骗我！我怎么那么傻？
Translate1: So you were lying to me! Why am I so stupid?

Pinyin1: chē chàdiǎn zhuàng dào wǒ 。
Translate1: The car almost hit me.

Pinyin1: wǒmen chàdiǎn xiāngxìn tā 。
Translate1: We almost believed him.

Pinyin1: tāmen chàdiǎn dǎ qǐlai 。
Translate1: They almost got into a fight.

Pinyin1: wǒ chàdiǎn wàng le 。
Translate1: I almost forgot.

Pinyin1: wǒ jīntiān chàdiǎn chídào le 。
Translate1: I was almost late today.

Pinyin1: tā chàdiǎn fēng le 。
Translate1: She almost went crazy.

Pinyin1: tā chàdiǎn jiù sǐ le 。
Translate1: He almost died.

Pinyin1: cài chàdiǎn hú le 。
Translate1: The dish was almost mushy.

Pinyin1: wǒmen duì chàdiǎn shū le 。
Translate1: Our team almost lost.

Pinyin1: wǒ chàdiǎn jiù dǎ tā le 。
Translate1: I almost ran into him.

Pinyin1: tā chuān dé hěnshǎo ， jiéguǒ gǎnmào le 。
Chinese1: 她穿得很少，结果感冒了。
Translate1: She wore very little and ended up with a cold.

Pinyin1: wǒ tàijǐnzhāng le ， jiéguǒ shuōcuò le hěnduō 。
Chinese1: 我太紧张了，结果说错了很多。
Translate1: I was so nervous and ended up saying a lot wrong.

Pinyin1: tā kāidé tàikuài le ， jiéguǒ zhuàng dào le yīgè rén 。
Chinese1: 他开得太快了，结果撞到了一个人。
Translate1: He drove too fast and hit a man.

Pinyin1: tā méi hǎohǎo fùxí ， jiéguǒ kǎoshì méikǎo hǎo 。
Chinese1: 他没好好复习，结果考试没考好。
Translate1: He didn't study hard and failed the exam as a result.

Pinyin1: tā zǒngshì chídào ， jiéguǒ lǎobǎn chǎo le tā de yóuyú 。
Chinese1: 他总是迟到，结果老板炒了他的鱿鱼。
Translate1: He was always late and his boss fired him.

Pinyin1: wǒ qù jīchǎng jiē tā ， jiéguǒ méi jiēdào tā 。
Chinese1: 我去机场接他，结果没接到他。
Translate1: I went to the airport to pick him up, but I didn't pick him up.

Pinyin1: wǒ gēn péngyou dǎdǔ ， jiéguǒ wǒshū le 。
Chinese1: 我跟朋友打赌，结果我输了。
Translate1: I made a bet with my friend and I lost.

Pinyin1: wǒ zuótiān gēn péngyou qù hējiǔ ， jiéguǒ hēzuì le 。
Chinese1: 我昨天跟朋友去喝酒，结果喝醉了。
Translate1: I went drinking with my friends yesterday and got drunk.

Pinyin1: tā chī le hěnduō yào ， jiéguǒ dōu méiyǒu yòng 。
Chinese1: 他吃了很多药，结果都没有用。
Translate1: He took a lot of medicine, but it didn't work.

Pinyin1: wǒdiǎn de shì niúròu hànbǎo ， jiéguǒ fúwùyuán gěi le wǒ yīgè jīròu de 。
Chinese1: 我点的是牛肉汉堡，结果服务员给了我一个鸡肉的。
Translate1: I ordered a beef burger and the waiter gave me a chicken one.

Pinyin1: jīntiān kǒngpà yào xiàyǔ 。
Translate1: I'm afraid it will rain today.

Pinyin1: zhè shì hěn zhòngyào de juédìng ， nǐ kǒngpà bùnéng zhème zháojí 。
Chinese1: 这是很重要的决定，你恐怕不能这么着急。
Translate1: This is an important decision, and I'm afraid you can't rush it.

Pinyin1: zhège yánsè tàifěn le ， kǒngpà wǒ nǚér bù xǐhuan 。
Chinese1: 这个颜色太粉了，恐怕我女儿不喜欢。
Translate1: The color is too pink, I'm afraid my daughter won't like it.

Pinyin1: zhèjiàn shì kǒngpà dé nǐ bāngmáng 。
Translate1: I'm afraid I need your help to figure this out.

Pinyin1: nǐ xiànzài zhīdào bèi piàn le ？
Translate1: Do you know now that you have been lied to?

Pinyin1: zhèyàng zuò kǒngpà bùtài héshì 。
Translate1: It's probably not appropriate to do so.

Pinyin1: kǒngpà méi nàme róngyì bā 。
Translate1: I'm afraid it's not that easy.

Pinyin1: yīgè rénqù nàgè dìfāng kǒngpà bùtài ānquán bā 。
Chinese1: 一个人去那个地方恐怕不太安全吧。
Translate1: It might not be safe to go there alone.

Pinyin1: nǐ zhèyàng shuō ， kǒngpà tā huì bù gāoxìng bā 。
Chinese1: 你这样说，恐怕她会不高兴吧。
Translate1: If you say that, I'm afraid she won't be happy.

Pinyin1: kǒngpà wǒ bāngbùle nǐ 。
Translate1: I'm afraid I can't help you.

Pinyin1: wǒmen mǎi le hěnduō cài ， gòuchī le 。
Chinese1: 我们买了很多菜，够吃了。
Translate1: We bought a lot of vegetables, enough to eat.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē zhǐ gòuyòng ma ？
Translate1: Are these papers enough?

Pinyin1: fàngxīn bā ， wǒ dài de qián gòuhuā 。
Translate1: Don't worry, I have enough money to spend.

Pinyin1: wǒ duì nǐ gòu hǎo le 。
Translate1: I'm good enough for you.

Pinyin1: bié bàoyuàn le ， nǐgòu xìngyùn le 。
Translate1: Stop complaining, you're lucky.

Pinyin1: tā juéde tā nǚpéngyou bùgòu piàoliang 。
Chinese1: 他觉得他女朋友不够漂亮。
Translate1: He thinks his girlfriend is not pretty enough.

Pinyin1: nǐ shuō dé bùgòu qīngchu 。
Translate1: You didn't speak clearly enough.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē cài bùgòu chī ， zàidiǎn jǐge cài 。
Chinese1: 这些菜不够吃，再点几个菜。
Translate1: These dishes are not enough to eat, order a few more dishes.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ tàixiǎo le ， bùgòu zuò 。
Translate1: It's too small to sit down here.

Pinyin1: nǐ de bāo tàixiǎo le ， zhèxiē dōngxi kěndìng bùgòu fàng 。
Chinese1: 你的包太小了，这些东西肯定不够放。
Translate1: Your bag is too small for these things.

Pinyin1: wǒ shòugòule ！
Translate1: I've had enough!

Pinyin1: tiāntiān chī wàimài ， wǒmen dōu chī gòu le 。
Chinese1: 天天吃外卖，我们都吃够了。
Translate1: Eating takeaway every day, we all have enough.

Pinyin1: nǐ wángòu le méiyǒu ？
Translate1: Have you had enough fun?

Pinyin1: měige guānzhòng shènzhì cáipàn dōu zhàn qǐlai gěi tā gǔzhǎng 。
Chinese1: 每个观众甚至裁判都站起来给他鼓掌。
Translate1: Every spectator and even the referee stood up and applauded him.

Pinyin1: tātàimáng le ， shènzhì lián chī zhōngfàn de shíjiān dōu méiyǒu 。
Chinese1: 他太忙了，甚至连吃中饭的时间都没有。
Translate1: He is so busy that he doesn't even have time for lunch.

Pinyin1: tā cóngláibù liáo gōngzuò de shì ， shènzhì gēn tā lǎopó yě bù shuō 。
Chinese1: 他从来不聊工作的事，甚至跟他老婆也不说。
Translate1: He never talked about work, not even with his wife.

Pinyin1: zhège wèntí hěn jiǎndān ， shènzhì lián háizi dōu zhīdào 。
Chinese1: 这个问题很简单，甚至连孩子都知道。
Translate1: The question is so simple that even children know it.

Pinyin1: wǒ nánpéngyou hěn xǐhuan yóuyǒng ， shènzhì lián dōngtiān yě yóu 。
Chinese1: 我男朋友很喜欢游泳，甚至连冬天也游。
Translate1: My boyfriend loves swimming, even in winter.

Pinyin1: háishi ràng tā jìnlái bā 。
Translate1: Let her in.

Pinyin1: nǐ háishi kuàidiǎn zǒu bā 。
Translate1: You'd better go quickly.

Pinyin1: wǒmen háishi bāngbāng tā bā 。
Translate1: Let's help him.

Pinyin1: tàiwǎn le ， háishi xiān huíjiābā 。
Translate1: It's too late, let's go home first.

Pinyin1: zhèlǐ tàizàng le ， wǒmen háishi zǒu bā 。
Chinese1: 这里太脏了，我们还是走吧。
Translate1: It's too dirty here, let's go.

Pinyin1: kuài chídào le ， wǒmen háishi dǎchē bā 。
Chinese1: 快迟到了，我们还是打车吧。
Translate1: It's almost late, let's take a taxi.

Pinyin1: tàiguì le ， háishi biémǎi le 。
Translate1: It's too expensive, so don't buy it.

Pinyin1: tā bùxiǎng shuō ， háishi bùyào zài wèn le 。
Chinese1: 她不想说，还是不要再问了。
Translate1: She didn't want to say it, so don't ask any more.

Pinyin1: tā yīdìng bù tóngyì ， háishi bié gēn tā shuō le 。
Chinese1: 他一定不同意，还是别跟他说了。
Translate1: He must disagree, so don't tell him.

Pinyin1: nǐ zuìhǎo xiān xiūxi yīxià 。
Translate1: You'd better take a break first.

Pinyin1: nǐmen zuìhǎo gěi tā dǎgè diànhuà wèn yīxià 。
Chinese1: 你们最好给他打个电话问一下。
Translate1: You'd better give him a call and ask.

Pinyin1: nàgè dìfāng bùhǎo zhǎo ， wǒmen zuìhǎo chá yīxià bǎidù dìtú 。
Chinese1: 那个地方不好找，我们最好查一下百度地图。
Translate1: That place is hard to find, we'd better check Baidu Maps.

Pinyin1: wàimiàn tǐng lěng de ， zuìhǎo duō chuāndiǎn 。
Chinese1: 外面挺冷的，最好多穿点。
Translate1: It's cold outside, you'd better wear more clothes.

Pinyin1: zhège huódòng hěn zhòngyào ， wǒmen zuìhǎo chuān dé zhèngshì yīdiǎn 。
Chinese1: 这个活动很重要，我们最好穿得正式一点。
Translate1: This event is important, we'd better dress formally.

Pinyin1: zuìhǎo biéqù 。
Translate1: Better not go.

Pinyin1: zuìhǎo bùyào zhèyàng shuō 。
Translate1: It's best not to say that.

Pinyin1: wǎnfàn zuìhǎo bùyào chī nàme duō 。
Chinese1: 晚饭最好不要吃那么多。
Translate1: It is best not to eat so much for dinner.

Pinyin1: yǔ zhème dà ， zuìhǎo bié chūmén 。
Translate1: It's raining so hard, you'd better not go out.

Pinyin1: zhège wèntí shì yǐnsī de ， zuìhǎo bùyào wèn 。
Chinese1: 这个问题是隐私的，最好不要问。
Translate1: This question is private and best left alone.

Pinyin1: dàodǐ shì gè dà lǎobǎn ， chūshǒu jiùshì dàfāng 。
Chinese1: 到底是个大老板，出手就是大方。
Translate1: After all, he is a big boss, so he is generous in his actions.

Pinyin1: dàodǐ háishi háizi ， yǒuxiē shìqing tā bù dǒng shì hěn zhèngcháng de 。
Chinese1: 到底还是孩子，有些事情他不懂是很正常的。
Translate1: After all, he is still a child, and it is normal for him to not understand some things.

Pinyin1: nǐ dàodǐ zěnme le ？
Translate1: What happened to you?

Pinyin1: dàodǐ zěnme zǒu ？
Translate1: How to go?

Pinyin1: nǐ dàodǐ shuō bù shuō ？
Translate1: Are you going to say it or not?

Pinyin1: nǐ dàodǐ xǐbùxǐhuān wǒ ？
Translate1: Do you like me or not?

Pinyin1: tāmen dàodǐ lí méi líhūn ？
Translate1: Are they divorced or not?

Pinyin1: nǐ dàodǐ chī le méiyǒu ？
Translate1: Did you eat it?

Pinyin1: tiānqì dàodǐ nuǎnhuo qǐlai le 。
Translate1: The weather has finally warmed up.

Pinyin1: tā dàodǐ xiǎng míngbai le 。
Translate1: He figured it out.

Pinyin1: zhège rén jiūjìng shì shéi ？
Translate1: Who is this person?

Pinyin1: nǐ jiūjìng shì zuò shénme de ？
Translate1: What exactly do you do?

Pinyin1: tāmen jiūjìng shénme shíhou dào ？
Translate1: When exactly will they arrive?

Pinyin1: wǒmen jiūjìng huányào děng duōjiǔ ？
Translate1: How much longer do we have to wait?

Pinyin1: nǐmen jiūjìng xiǎng ràng wǒ zěnme zuò ？
Chinese1: 你们究竟想让我怎么做？
Translate1: What exactly do you want me to do?

Pinyin1: nǐ jiūjìng lái bùlái ？
Translate1: Are you coming or not?

Pinyin1: nǐmen jiūjìng néng bùnéng bāng wǒ ？
Translate1: Can you guys help me?

Pinyin1: tā jiūjìng shìbùshì nǐ nǚpéngyou ？
Chinese1: 她究竟是不是你女朋友？
Translate1: Is she your girlfriend?

Pinyin1: nǐ jiūjìng xǐbùxǐhuān wǒ ？
Translate1: Do you like me or not?

Pinyin1: jīnglǐ jiūjìng tóng bù tóngyì ？
Translate1: Does the manager agree?

Pinyin1: háizi jiūjìng shì háizi ， zǒngshì xiǎngzhe zěnme wán 。
Chinese1: 孩子究竟是孩子，总是想着怎么玩。
Translate1: Children are children after all, always thinking about how to play.

Pinyin1: shànghǎi jiūjìng shì shànghǎi ， shēnghuó chéngběn jiùshì gāo 。
Chinese1: 上海究竟是上海，生活成本就是高。
Translate1: Shanghai is Shanghai after all, and the cost of living is high.

Pinyin1: niánqīngrén jiūjìng shì niánqīngrén ， jīnglì zhēn hǎo 。
Chinese1: 年轻人究竟是年轻人，精力真好。
Translate1: Young people are young after all, so energetic.

Pinyin1: wǒmen gāng zhīdào 。
Translate1: We just found out.

Pinyin1: lǎobǎn gānggang dào bàngōngshì 。
Translate1: The boss has just arrived at the office.

Pinyin1: wǒ lǎopó gāngshēng wán háizi 。
Translate1: My wife just gave birth.

Pinyin1: nǐ gānggang xiàbān ma ？
Translate1: Did you just get off work?

Pinyin1: wǒgāng rènshi tā shítiān 。
Translate1: I've only known her for ten days.

Pinyin1: tā gānglái zhōngguó liǎnggè yuè 。
Translate1: He has just been in China for two months.

Pinyin1: wǒ dìdi gāng gōngzuò bànnián 。
Translate1: My younger brother has just worked for half a year.

Pinyin1: tā gāng jiéhūn sānge yuè 。
Translate1: She has just been married for three months.

Pinyin1: wǒ de chēgāng mǎi liǎngtiān ， kāi de shíhou xiǎoxīn diǎn 。
Chinese1: 我的车刚买两天，开的时候小心点。
Translate1: I just bought my car two days ago, so be careful when you drive it.

Pinyin1: biéchǎo ， yīgè yīgè shuō 。
Translate1: Don't make noise, talk one by one.

Pinyin1: biézháojí ， yīdiǎnyīdiǎn zuò 。
Translate1: Take it easy, do it little by little.

Pinyin1: qǐng yīgè fángjiān yīgè fángjiān jiǎnchá 。
Chinese1: 请一个房间一个房间检查。
Translate1: Please check room by room.

Pinyin1: bié ná nàme duō ， yīgè yīgè ná 。
Chinese1: 别拿那么多，一个一个拿。
Translate1: Don't take so many, take one by one.

Pinyin1: bǎobǎo yītiān yītiān zài zhǎngdà 。
Translate1: Babies are growing up day by day.

Pinyin1: wǒ yīcì yīcì wèn ， tā jiùshì shénme dōu bù shuō 。
Chinese1: 我一次一次问，他就是什么都不说。
Translate1: I asked again and again, but he just didn't say anything.

Pinyin1: wǒ yībiàn yībiàn dì gēn tā jiěshì ， tā háishi bù tīng 。
Chinese1: 我一遍一遍地跟他解释，他还是不听。
Translate1: I explained it to him over and over again, but he still didn't listen.

Pinyin1: nǐ wèishénme yībiàn yòu yībiàn dì tīng zhè shǒugē ？
Chinese1: 你为什么一遍又一遍地听这首歌？
Translate1: Why do you listen to this song over and over again?

Pinyin1: wǒ běnlái shì yào qù de ， bùguò hòulái bùtài shūfu ， jiù méi qù 。
Chinese1: 我本来是要去的，不过后来不太舒服，就没去。
Translate1: I was going to go, but then I felt uncomfortable, so I didn't go.

Pinyin1: tā běnlái shì yīnggāi kǎodé gēnghǎo de ， kěshì nàtiān tā shēngbìng le 。
Chinese1: 他本来是应该考得更好的，可是那天他生病了。
Translate1: He should have done better in the test, but he was sick that day.

Pinyin1: wǒmen běnlái xiǎng qù zhǎo tā bāngmáng de ， kěshì tā nàme máng ， jiù méi qù 。
Chinese1: 我们本来想去找他帮忙的，可是他那么忙，就没去。
Translate1: We wanted to go to him for help, but he was so busy, so we didn't go.

Pinyin1: zhèxiē gōngzuò běnlái shì yào jīntiān zuò wán de ， bùguò míngtiān zuò yě kěyǐ 。
Chinese1: 这些工作本来是要今天做完的，不过明天做也可以。
Translate1: These tasks were supposed to be done today, but they can be done tomorrow.

Pinyin1: nǐ běnlái jiùgòu shòu le ， huányào jiǎnféi ma ？
Chinese1: 你本来就够瘦了，还要减肥吗？
Translate1: You are already thin enough, do you still want to lose weight?

Pinyin1: tā jiǎng dé běnlái jiù bù duì ， wèishénme huányào wǒ tīng tā de ？
Chinese1: 他讲得本来就不对，为什么还要我听他的？
Translate1: What he said was wrong, why should I listen to him?

Pinyin1: tā běnlái jiù hěn yǒuqián ， dāngrán mǎidéqǐ le 。
Chinese1: 她本来就很有钱，当然买得起了。
Translate1: She was already rich, so of course she could afford it.

Pinyin1: tā běnlái jiù bù xǐhuan nǐ ， nǐbié zài zhuī tā le 。
Chinese1: 她本来就不喜欢你，你别再追她了。
Translate1: She doesn't like you in the first place, so stop chasing her.

Pinyin1: tā běnlái jiù hěn xǐhuan kāiwánxiào ， nǐ biéjièyì 。
Chinese1: 他本来就很喜欢开玩笑，你别介意。
Translate1: He's always been a joker, don't mind that.

Pinyin1: lǎoshī běnlái jiù yīnggāi hǎohǎo bèikè 。
Chinese1: 老师本来就应该好好备课。
Translate1: The teacher should have prepared lessons well.

Pinyin1: bānjiā běnlái jiù hěn máfan 。
Translate1: Moving was already a hassle.

Pinyin1: shēnghuó běnlái jiù hěn bù róngyì 。
Translate1: Life is not easy.

Pinyin1: wǒmen dōu wàng le ， jiù tā huán jìde 。
Chinese1: 我们都忘了，就他还记得。
Translate1: We all forgot, but he still remembered.

Pinyin1: dàjiā dōu xiàbān le ， jiù lǎobǎn huán méi zǒu 。
Chinese1: 大家都下班了，就老板还没走。
Translate1: Everyone is off work, but the boss hasn't left yet.

Pinyin1: qítā de cài dōu hěn hàochī ， jiù zhè liǎnggè cài yǒudiǎnxián 。
Chinese1: 其他的菜都很好吃，就这两个菜有点咸。
Translate1: All other dishes are delicious, but these two dishes are a bit salty.

Pinyin1: nǐ juéde biéren dōu shì shǎzi ma ？
Chinese1: 你觉得别人都是傻子吗？
Translate1: Do you think everyone else is stupid?
